text:
@ProjectLincoln @realDonaldTrump He probably rcv'd the intel report and ignored it, like he does all of them. The moron can't read. He gets his briefing from Fox. And, as usual, his hubris kills. Intel reports warning about COVID19 came in NOVEMBER! He ignored ithem.

I like presidents who can read.
